content:
Sure, here is a list of the top 20 international film festivals, including a maximum of 5 from the US:

1. Cannes Film Festival (France)
2. Berlin International Film Festival (Germany)
3. Venice Film Festival (Italy)
4. Toronto International Film Festival (Canada)
5. Sundance Film Festival (US)
6. BFI London Film Festival (UK)
7. Rotterdam International Film Festival (Netherlands)
8. San Sebastián International Film Festival (Spain)
9. Hong Kong International Film Festival (China)
10. Busan International Film Festival (South Korea)
11. Locarno International Film Festival (Switzerland)
12. Sydney Film Festival (Australia)
13. Moscow International Film Festival (Russia)
14. Shanghai International Film Festival (China)
15. Dubai International Film Festival (United Arab Emirates)
16. Karlovy Vary International Film Festival (Czech Republic)
17. Jerusalem Film Festival (Israel)
18. Vienna International Film Festival (Austria)
19. Sarajevo Film Festival (Bosnia and Herzegovina)
20. Marrakech International Film Festival (Morocco)
